ui.console.title: Drone Warehouse Console
ui.beacon.label: Beacon: {{size}}x{{size}}
tooltip.harvest:
Harvester — a drone that collects ripe crops and forage on the farm.
Everything it collects is stored in the warehouse chest.
tooltip.water:
Waterer — a drone that waters hoed tiles.
Every 10 in-game minutes it checks for dry tiles.
tooltip.pet:
Petter — a drone that pets your farm animals and pets.
Only when they are outdoors.
tooltip.farmer:
A powerful drone that tills and plants tirelessly.
Press F6 or the console button to open the planting controller.
It can clear grass and small debris that block planting.
